# Wings of Flying
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 10th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 54,000 gp

**Weight** 2 lbs.

**Description**

A pair of these wings might appear to be nothing more than a plain cloak of old, black cloth, or they could be as elegant as a long cape of blue feathers. When the wearer speaks the command word, the cloak turns into a pair of bat or bird wings that empower her to fly with a speed of 60 feet (average maneuverability), also granting a +5 competence bonus on [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] skill checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*

**Cost** 27,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 532
